main event: On July 8, 1954, a civilian observed a luminous object in the sky hovering and moving at high speed in Cleveland Heights, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was described as round and twice the size of a B-47 bomber,It was observed at approximately 2,000 feet altitude for about 30 seconds before it accelerated and disappeared,The witness claimed it made no sound and showed no signs of a propulsion system,The object emitted a yellowish-orange glow and the sightings occurred during clear weather,The witness had prior experience as a student pilot and stated this was unlike any conventional aircraft.
sighted object: luminous round object in the sky
witness description: A 25-year-old male insurance salesman and underwriter.
